messages.score_good: Bon travail ! Vous avez une bonne compréhension de la transformation GenAI.
messages.score_average: Continuez à apprendre ! Il y a encore des opportunités d'amélioration.

dashboard.title: Executive Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Track your AI transformation progress
dashboard.impact_message: Avec un score de {score}/{max_score}, vous avez {enabler_count} capacités disponibles.

login_page.title: The AI Quest
login_page.subtitle: PlayForward
login_page.description: Connectez-vous pour commencer votre transformation IA

welcome_page.title: Welcome!
welcome_page.rich_text:
You are Sophie, the AI Director at PlayForward, a leading Online Betting and Lottery company with 1800 employees worldwide. Facing fast-moving competition and evolving player expectations, the company must reinvent how it creates, delivers, and scales innovation.

Your mission: define how AI can accelerate creativity and performance — without compromising the culture, values, and human spirit that make PlayForward unique.

introduction_page.title: Introduction
introduction_page.subtitle: Strategic Assessment Complete
introduction_page.description: Following the first strategic discussions, Sophie – the AI Director – decided to go with the value-driven approach of Elena. Over the past weeks, the AI team assessed potential AI opportunities across production, marketing, operations, and player engagement. Now, Marcus – the CEO – expects Sophie to present a synthesis of the most promising use cases — the ones that deliver measurable impact quickly, with reasonable effort and manageable risk.
introduction_page.objective: Your objective is now to prioritize where AI can create visible value while keeping complexity under control. Which AI use cases will you launch?

teams_meeting_page.title: Teams Meeting
teams_meeting_page.subtitle: Strategy Workshop
teams_meeting_page.description: Sophie is now organizing a strategy workshop with three key stakeholders — the IT Director, the Strategy & Change Director, and the Marketing & Player Experience Director — to define how AI should be integrated into the company's innovation and production model.

step1_followup_page.title: STEP 2: Building Your AI Use Cases Portfolio
step1_followup_page.subtitle: Step 1 Follow-up
step1_followup_page.description: Following the first strategic discussions, Sophie – the AI Director – decided to go with the value-driven approach of Elena. Over the past weeks, the AI team assessed potential AI opportunities across production, marketing, operations, and player engagement. Now, Marcus – the CEO – expects Sophie to present a synthesis of the most promising use cases — the ones that deliver measurable impact quickly, with reasonable effort and manageable risk.
step1_followup_page.objective: Your objective is now to prioritize where AI can create visible value while keeping complexity under control. Which AI use cases will you launch?

pilot_step_page.title: STEP 3: Launching Your Priority AI Pilots
pilot_step_page.subtitle: Launching Your Priority AI Pilots
pilot_step_page.description: The selected projects are now moving into pilot phase. Each team has started working with vendors, datasets, and internal champions. Sophie's next challenge is to ensure that these pilots not only deliver results but also that the teams invest on the right enablers that accelerate transformation, build trust, and make change sustainable. Which enablers will you choose?

enterprise_scaling_page.title: STEP 5: Deploying AI Across the Organization
enterprise_scaling_page.subtitle: Scaling Your AI and GenAI Solutions
enterprise_scaling_page.description: After several months of scaling, AI and GenAI are now part of PlayNext's daily rhythm.

step1.title: STEP 1: Get Started With The Right AI Strategy
step1.description: You've heard three different approaches to launch your AI transformation. Which one will you choose?

elena.title: Value-Driven Approach with Elena
elena.description: Focus on high-impact, low-effort AI initiatives aligned with business value.

james.title: Technology-Driven Approach with James
james.description: Prioritize cutting-edge AI technologies and infrastructure upgrades.

amira.title: Customer-Centric Approach with Amira
amira.description: Develop AI solutions that directly enhance player experience and engagement.

step2.title: STEP 2: Building Your AI Use Cases Portfolio
step2.description: Among the five AI solutions highlighted on the matrix, which three will you select and implement first?

step3.title: STEP 3: Launching Your Priority AI Pilots
step3.description: With your use cases identified, it's time to launch your first AI pilots.

step4.title: STEP 4: Scaling Your AI and GenAI Solutions
step4.description: Your pilots are successful! Now it's time to scale across the organization.

step5.title: STEP 5: Deploying AI Across the Organization
step5.description: The final step: deploying AI across the entire organization.

phase1.title: STEP 1: Get Started With The Right AI Strategy
phase1.description: Define AI strategy and assess opportunities

elena.title: Map where AI creates the most value and align with company culture

james.title: Build strong foundations: secure data, tools, and architecture first

amira.title: Act fast - democratize AI, let teams experiment immediately

fraud_integrity_detection.title: Fraud & Integrity Detection
fraud_integrity_detection.description: Machine learning system that spots irregular in-game transactions and protects player trust.

ai_storyline_generator.title: AI-Powered Storyline Generator
ai_storyline_generator.description: Supports writers by creating adaptive narratives based on player choices.

smart_game_design_assistant.title: Smart Game Design Assistant
smart_game_design_assistant.description: Generative AI that helps designers create concept art and levels faster while keeping our art style.

player_journey_optimizer.title: Player Journey Optimizer
player_journey_optimizer.description: Predictive engine that analyzes player behavior and suggests personalized missions and rewards

talent_analytics_dashboard.title: Talent Analytics Dashboard
talent_analytics_dashboard.description: Internal tool to track AI skills and training needs across teams.

ai_data_foundations.title: AI & Data Foundations
ai_data_foundations.description: Evolve hybrid data platform (warehouse + lakehouse) to an Agentic Lakehouse platform, model registry and secure model hosting, with governed Data Products exposed through the Data Marketplace.

model_automation_framework.title: Model Automation Framework
model_automation_framework.description: Implement automated and standardized practices (MLOps & FMOps) to seamlessly deploy, monitor, and maintain AI and foundational models in production, ensuring scalability, reliability, and faster time-to-value.

data_readiness_review.title: Data Readiness Review
data_readiness_review.description: Maintain an enterprise view of Data Products (availability, quality, lineage, ownership) to inform AI feasibility and enrichment opportunities.

ai_leadership_program.title: AI Leadership Program
ai_leadership_program.description: Run focused learning for leaders on AI potential, risk, and value realization, anchored in company use cases and leadership toolkits (ethics, governance, talent).

hands_on_ai_bootcamp.title: Hands-On AI Bootcamp for Teams
hands_on_ai_bootcamp.description: A practical upskilling program for delivery teams (designers, analysts, and operators) to master generative and predictive AI tools.

ai_co_creation_labs.title: AI Co-Creation Labs
ai_co_creation_labs.description: Bring together representative end‑users to collaboratively shape future workflows, prototype AI‑enabled processes, and run in‑context tests to confirm usability and business fit before scaling.

responsible_ai_framework.title: Responsible AI Framework
responsible_ai_framework.description: Integrating responsible AI duties into leadership and expert roles to make ethics part of daily decision-making.

ai_governance_roadmap.title: AI Governance Roadmap
ai_governance_roadmap.description: Establish clear governance structures, roles, and processes to ensure AI initiatives align with business objectives and regulatory requirements.

ai_governance_board.title: AI Governance Board
ai_governance_board.description: Create a cross-functional board to oversee AI strategy, risk management, and ethical considerations.

reusable_api_patterns.title: Reusable API Patterns
reusable_api_patterns.description: Standardize API patterns for AI services to enable faster development and better integration.

industrial_data_pipelines.title: Industrial Data Pipelines
industrial_data_pipelines.description: Build robust, scalable data pipelines to support AI workloads across the organization.

privacy_by_design_data.title: Privacy by Design Data
privacy_by_design_data.description: Implement privacy-first data practices to ensure compliance and build trust.

talent_mobility_program.title: Talent Mobility Program
talent_mobility_program.description: Create programs to help employees transition into AI roles and develop new skills.

business_ai_champions.title: Business AI Champions
business_ai_champions.description: Identify and develop AI champions across business units to drive adoption.

ai_storytelling_communication.title: AI Storytelling Communication
ai_storytelling_communication.description: Develop communication strategies to share AI success stories and build excitement.

adoption_playbook.title: Adoption Playbook
adoption_playbook.description: Create a comprehensive playbook for rolling out AI solutions across the organization.

clear_ownership_accountability.title: Clear Ownership & Accountability
clear_ownership_accountability.description: Establish clear ownership structures and accountability frameworks for AI initiatives.

local_ai_risk_management.title: Local AI Risk Management
local_ai_risk_management.description: Implement localized risk management practices for AI deployments.

ai_for_all.title: AI for all
ai_for_all.description: Turn AI into a company-wide service by communicating ethical standards and sharing tools across teams.

continuous_capability_building.title: Continuous capability building
continuous_capability_building.description: Define a long-term roadmap for AI governance, develop preferred supplier partnerships, and expand the AI Academy to strengthen internal skills.

full_speed_on_people.title: Full speed on people
full_speed_on_people.description: Create a dedicated AI Hub, formalize partnerships, invest in recruiting top AI talents, and grow internal expertise through the AI Academy.

ai_value_opportunities.title: AI Value Opportunities
ai_value_opportunities.description: Map where AI creates the most value and identify productivity opportunities

ai_benchmark_in_gaming.title: AI Benchmark in Gaming
ai_benchmark_in_gaming.description: Comprehensive scan of AI technologies and market landscape

ai_tech_strategic_partnership.title: AI-tech Strategic Partnership
ai_tech_strategic_partnership.description: Build strategic partnerships with technology providers

bulk_data_transfert.title: Bulk Data Transfert
bulk_data_transfert.description: Enables the fast and secure movement of large datasets between environments to support AI experimentation or migration

ai_value_opportunities_gaming.title: AI Value Opportunities in gaming
ai_value_opportunities_gaming.description: Quantify and assess where augmentation and automation bring the most impact across teams (game design, customer support, engineering, corporate functions), using pilot evidence and value notes.

ai_tech_benchmark.title: AI Tech benchmark
ai_tech_benchmark.description: Systematically benchmark AI/GenAI and data solutions, documenting value, TCO, integration complexity, and fit with our reference

sourcing_ai_tech.title: Sourcing of an AI-tech
sourcing_ai_tech.description: Purchase licences for a small set of core partners (ScaleAI Pro, Mistral, Leonardo.ai, Footovision, ...), organize roadshows across Bus and functions and train the first 100

bulk_data_migration.title: Bulk Data Migration
bulk_data_migration.description: Extract, transform and load massively all the key datasets from core systems (ERP, CRM, ...) to the AI tech platform.

simulated_game_design.title: Simulated Game Design

fraud_detection.title: Fraud Detection

trusted_partner_ecosystem.1: By choosing "Trusted Partner Ecosystem", you earned 1 star out of three. A solid foundation for AI partnerships, but there's room for more comprehensive integration.
trusted_partner_ecosystem.2: By choosing "Trusted Partner Ecosystem", you earned 2 stars out of three. Excellent strategic partnerships that will accelerate your AI transformation.
trusted_partner_ecosystem.3: By choosing "Trusted Partner Ecosystem", you earned 3 stars out of three. Outstanding! You've built a world-class AI partner ecosystem that will drive innovation for years to come.

group_responsible_ai_awareness.1: By choosing "Group Responsible AI Awareness", you earned 1 star out of three. Good start on responsible AI, but more comprehensive programs are needed.
group_responsible_ai_awareness.2: By choosing "Group Responsible AI Awareness", you earned 2 stars out of three. Strong responsible AI practices that build trust and ensure ethical deployment.
group_responsible_ai_awareness.3: By choosing "Group Responsible AI Awareness", you earned 3 stars out of three. Exceptional! You've created a culture of responsible AI that sets the industry standard.

value_driven_governance.1: By choosing "Value-Driven Governance", you earned 1 star out of three. Basic governance in place, but more sophisticated value measurement is needed.
value_driven_governance.2: By choosing "Value-Driven Governance", you earned 2 stars out of three. Well-structured governance that balances value creation with risk management.
value_driven_governance.3: By choosing "Value-Driven Governance", you earned 3 stars out of three. Perfect! Your governance framework maximizes AI value while ensuring sustainable growth.
